author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Truett-Hurst Q2 Loss Per Share $0.09
text: February 14, 2018 / 7:47 PM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-Truett-Hurst Q2 Loss Per Share $0.09 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 14 (Reuters) - Truett-Hurst Inc: * TRUETT-HURST INC QTRLY ‍ TOTAL NET SALES DECREASED 0.6% COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD IN PRIOR YEAR AND TOTALED $5.7 MILLION​ * TRUETT-HURST INC Q2 LOSS PER SHARE $0.09 * TRUETT-HURST INC - ‍WILL NOT BE CONDUCTING AN EARNINGS CALL RELATED TO ITS RESULTS FOR Q2 OF FISCAL YEAR 2018 ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2EIMPzO ) Further company coverage:
